newsitem.title: USA: Calypte says FDA seeks more information.
newsitem.headline: Calypte says FDA seeks more information.

text.p: Calypte Biomedical Corp said Friday that the FDA will require additional data before approving an amendment to Cambridge Biotech Corp's product license application for Cambridge's HIV-1 Western Blot Kit to allow use of the Western Blot Kit as a confirmatory test with Calypte's HIV-1 urine screening assay.
The Calypte HIV-1 urine screening assay was approved by the FDA in August.

The FDA has requested more data be submitted increasing the number of urine samples in certain clinical groups and modifications in the urine controls supplied by Calypte for use with the Western Blot Kit as a confirmatory for the urine test.
Calypte said it will work closely with Cambridge to reach agreement with the FDA on the precise additional clinical data required, undertake the required studies, and submit those additional data.
